price: 〔我确已派遣〕鲁特，当时他对他的宗族说：“你们怎么做那种丑事呢？在你们之前，全世界的人没有一个做过这种事的。
arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنۡ أَحَدٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi atatūna al-fāḥishata mā sabaqakum bihā min aḥadin mina al-ʿālamīna
